sentences.en: Blackberry and sweet oak flavours spill onto the palate giving this wine a plump satiny texture.
sentences.cn: 黑莓和甜橡木风味使葡萄酒丰满光滑柔软.

sentences.en: Bronze a supermodel glow & sleek , sculpted cheekbones. This satiny pink & bronze powder a perfect 10!
sentences.cn: 十分完美腮红蜜粉粉红 及 古铜闪粉二合一,可塑造颧骨光影, 营造健康肤色, 得到完美10分.

sentences.en: She has very satiny skin and fresh smile.
sentences.cn: 她拥有丝般顺滑的皮肤和纯情的笑容。

sentences.en: Special alloys: varnished or satiny alloy with soft and refined colour modulations.
sentences.cn: 特殊合金: 漆皮或经过色彩调制并且光滑柔软的合金.
身穿光滑面料的紧身礼服的女人

words.tran_cn: 光滑的；绸缎做的；似缎的
假缎子；棉毛缎子；缎纹棉毛呢
光滑的，缎子似的，柔软的

trans.tran_cn: 缎子似的，有缎子般光泽的，光滑的
